snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire’s older brother, Hazell, 35, died in Lake Wales, Fla., early Monday morning, and Stoudemire has left the Knicks to be with his family.
abstract: Amar’e Stoudemire’s older brother, Hazell, 35, died in Lake Wales, Fla., early Monday morning, and Stoudemire has left the Knicks to be with his family.

headline.main: Stoudemire's Brother Killed in Florida Car Accident
headline.print_headline: Stoudemire Leaves Knicks After Brother’s Death
